title: Skin ideas?
body:
What are some skin ideas you want to see in the game? Personally i would love to see

God Fist Vi
Project Evelynn
Starguardian Xayah and Rakan

replies.body:
Avatar Taliyah - 3250 RP

Can change between Fire, Water, Earth and Air.

Since her default skin is earth based already, the earth version in that skin would be similiar to jungle terrain where all abilities are rocks covered in vines and moss.

> [{quoted}](name=Loa Erebonius,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=q8ra9FEs,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-02-13T16:08:18.810+0000)
>
> Avatar Taliyah - 3250 RP
> 
> Can change between Fire, Water, Earth and Air.
> 
> Since her default skin is earth based already, the earth version in that skin would be similiar to jungle terrain where all abilities are rocks covered in vines and moss.

Water. Earth. Fire. Air.

Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.

Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them. But when the world needed him most, he vanished.

A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang, and although his airbending skills are great, he still has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone.

But I believe Aang can save the world.
Elementalist Taliyah? :D
Based off Avatar the last airbender, but if it was to happen, they'd most likely call it Elementalist Taliyah, yeah,
I would love to see more elementalist skins and taliyah would be perfect

{{champion:17}}  **Little Devil Teemo Prestige Edition** - Make gold and white hellish, please.

Also need {{champion:202}} in that skin line then.

**Bunny Kalista**. {{champion:429}}  She has the perfect animations and figure for it. Her ponytail can be like Lola Bunny's, her hops would make perfect sense, her spears can be carrots, W can a bunny ghost... Not saying it would be a battle bunny like Riven or a onesie bunny like Fizz, but something along the lines of a bunny Kalista would be fun.

i would love a cyberpop or a virus kayn skin when he goes into E in blue and base form he turns into codes and when hes in red form he turns into a virus of some sort

We need a Season skin for all the plant-related champions, such as Ivern, Maokai and Zyra.

Just imagine it, similar to Elementalist Lux, after dealing enough damage or taking enough damage or taking enough jungle camps, they could get a Season related transformation. Just imagine Winter Forest Zyra or Summerwood Maokai or Autumn Ivern.

Honestly Riot, why is this not a thing?
I would love those

Dark Star {{champion:266}} Aatrox

His Qs would be dark purple with his 3rd Q being a dark star in the middle, his W would be a dark star (in a circle around the center to the edges), he would have a dark star in his chest instead of where his heart should be and it should grow bigger when he ults. His B animation would be him ripping out the dark star out of his chest, putting it on the ground and it would grow into a large dark star in which he would jump in and teleport at the fountain. Both his lore and his animations are perfectly compatible with the Dark Star skin line.
